alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:35PM CDT until July 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parchman, or 14 miles north of Ruleville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Drew around 800 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
